text: Red Devils () is a 1923 Soviet silent movie directed by Ivan Perestiani.Платоновский фестиваль принесет современное искусство в старую типографиюКРАСНЫЕ ДЬЯВОЛЯТА It stars Pavel Yesikovsky, Sofia Josephey, and Kador Ben-Salim. ==Actors== *Pavel Yesikovsky - Misha *Sofia Josephey - Dunyasha, Misha's sister *Kador Ben-Salim - Tom Jackson *Vladimir Kucherenko (credited as Vladimir Sutyrin) - Makhno *Konstantin Davidovsky - Budyonny == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet silent movies Category:1923 movies
title: Red Devils (movie)
